affects-issues.issue: Target is always the first argument in HtmlW/XmlW.
Performance Bottleneck: extensive use of toLowerCase in com.generationjava.web.HtmlW.getIndexOpeningTag
Recode XmlW/HtmlW to be two different childish parsers
moveToTagWith called twice will find the first one again

fixes-issues.issue: HtmlScraper needs to be case insensitive
